column4: Humpfh.  Next time I'm going to compile a kernel I'll do more work disabling all the things I don't need.  ;)
thats the easy bit , keeping the bits you do need and will need next week/month is harder .
Well, I don't need support for isdn, 90% of the sound stuff, 90% of the video stuff, and so forth ;D
So.. next time, i'll do a tad more work on it ;D
